title: Switching to Herbal Toothpaste: What to Expect
author: Harish
excerpt: Transitioning to herbal toothpaste can improve gum health and reduce chemical exposure—here’s what to expect and how to make the switch smoothly.
content:
Why Choose Herbal Toothpaste?

Herbal toothpastes avoid certain additives found in conventional products (like SLS or synthetic colors) and instead use antimicrobial herbs such as neem and soothing agents like licorice to support oral health naturally.

Transition Tips

  • Expect a different texture and less foaming — this is normal.
  • Give your mouth 2–3 weeks to adapt; gum sensitivity often improves.
  • Maintain regular dental checkups and professional cleanings.

When to Consult a Dentist

If you have bleeding gums, persistent bad breath, or loose teeth, consult a dentist before changing routine products.
